title: Is cassiopeia just really easy to play or have I found my next main.
body:
because holy shit, i havnt played this well on a champ since fuck prerework akali.

Like yeah sure im only 7 games in after buying her, but 71% winrate with a 3.6kda on a champion i have quite literally only played once before during ar-urf is, well like i said, i havnt played that good since prerework akali.

And just like prerework akali i havnt felt so intune with a champions kit since then either.

Like fuck man, im actually having fun again for the first time since... pre rework akali.

replies.body: Enjoy it man, I found velkoz last year and went b5 to s5 in a week and a half. You'd be surprised by how much difference having fun does

Please tell me about Pre-Rework Akali.

Really wondering how ez/fun she was

pretty much the same as current akali but her r cooldown was 1 second instead of 2 seconds (same charge cooldown) and its ap ratio was higher, e ratios were lower, so not too different.

Except for one little thing.

her passive gave her spell vamp based on your ad and on hit damage also based on ad but the ad scaling was based on your ap.

The passive was the main difference, rather than a frontloaded burst heal you had around 50% spell vamp with a minmaxed ad ap build with no defensive items.

Which was a super risk reward build and playstyle, you cleared faster with tiamat and could healh yourself from 0-100 instantly, but you had to play either super cautiously or super skillfully to avoid cc because one stun and you are gone kiddo.

I miss being 200hp sitting in a bush waiting for the adc jungler and support to walk up only to use the fast q ult combo (ult while your q is flying in the air and queue up the auto while you are mid dash) with gunblade to instantly burst the adc then proceed to use your sustain to 1v2 duel the support and jungler using ult to dodge skill shots etc.

man it was so good.

you can kind of still play like that now on just the gunblade omnivore passive but its just not the same, the risk got way higher to the point where it outweighs the reward, so now the only viable akali build is just front loaded burst single target.

Rather than lengthy sustain duels with somewhat ok burst.

She's a pretty good champion, 
I mean.. the essence of her kit is just: poison someone and then spastically mash E until they die..
But somehow it is a lot more fun than it sounds xD

But what Aidan7787 says is 100% true! you do so much better when you have fun.
It's far better to pick a champ or two that you really enjoy, and stick with them through thick and thin. Than to just play whatever's 'hot' at the time.
A 1,000,000 mastery Bard will perform much higher than a player who is new to a stronger support like Blitz.

Im happy for you man! I know how it felt when Azir, Sol and Taliyah came out. Im glad you get to feel that ^^
So go for it!

Yeah i think its her super low cooldowns that get me.

Even with the lack of mobility i feel like i can instantly turn a fight by throwing a q ult then healing up through e at like 0 health.

Which is why i fell in love with akali, with her old passive i was able to pull off monstrous no health 1v3's by just juking skill shots and healing through the point and clicks, they ruined that with the rework by nerfing her sustain into the ground.

But cass, cass can still do that, albiet without a dash.
If you like sick 1 v 3's and massive healing, and you've been put top, play this bad boy {{champion:122}} guaranteed easy win
youre in low bronze boi, any champ gonna feel strong

and any champ does feel strong, with any build, see the beauty of being in the wrong elo, is i can literally take full ad thresh mid with fervor and full lethality runes, and still dumpster the enemy team.

Im talking more the fact that with this one unless my team goes 0/30 i can still dumpster the enemy team.

Where as with my usual picks of ap shaco or ap ez, in that scenario id be the one getting dumpstered, mostly because with casses kit i can sustain while juking.

With their kit i can blow people up faster than cass sure, but im fucked without a lead which pretty much comes down to how much did my team feed this game.

Because as i mentioned before, im in the wrong elo, lane phase i will destroy my opponent 9/10, actually not even small enough odds, 95/100.

I lose lane, once every 50-100 games. its that rare.

most of my games are decided by whether or not my team fed more than i got fed.

The rest of them are decided by how well my team teamfights myself included.

Because thats the thing, sure im playing against bronze players, but give a toddler a gun, and they can still fuck your shit up.

All you have to do is give a bronze player a 10 kill lead.

And they will fuck your shit up, they only way you are beating that is if you are way WAY above them in rank, like were talking gold+ actually fuck that, plat+ lets give the items more credit for their power.

Take my last game, i was 12/1 with cass, quite literally dumpstering the enemy team, juking tibbers ults, do you know how hard it is to dodge a tibbers, its practically fucking impossible, i got hit with 1 all game, because i learned very quickly the annies pattern on where she ults.

Do you know why we lost? because top fed the crap out of a trynd.

Plain and simple, like i was busy dealing with the rest of their team, and no one on my team was good enough to stop this trynd, so unless i could split myself in two there was nothing i could do.

But unlike say shaco where i wouldve been dumpstered by that trynd, as cass i dumpstered him, hell only reason i didnt kill him is he learned very quickly to run the fuck away from me back to his team.

Annnnd the honeymoon period is over.

Still winning games, but not having fun anymore.

Love the champion, its not the champions fault.

its just not fun enough to distract me from my retarded ass teams anymore.

take my last game.

promos, told my team "all you have to do is not feed, thats ALL YOU HAVE TO DO"

And what do they do?

oh man, boy did they feed.

And not just feed their own lane either.

i absolutely crushed my laner, left her 0/4 in lane.

She ended the game with 9 kills and 12 assists.

Thats how fucking bad my team was.

They took an 0/4/0 fucking lux.

And fed her.

How do you even die to that, let alone feed it.

Have you seen that faker clip? Fakers Cassiopeia vs Maples LeBlanc 
Link to video : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oM8UHxR46uY&feature=youtu.be

If you can do this I'm sure playing as cass will be heaps of fun :D
Lots of champions are easy to play but aren't necessarily enjoyable, but if you do happen to find one of these champions enjoyable then the answer to your question is yes, to both.
